name: Simple Greek Couscous
author: DontWastetheCrumbs.com
summary: Kalamata olives, sun-dried tomatoes, and feta cheese add a Greek flair to a classic Mediterranean pasta.
ingredients: ⅔ cup chopped kalamata olives, liquid reserved
⅔ cup diced red bell pepper
½ cup diced sun-dried tomatoes, oil reserved
1 tablespoon dried parsley, or to taste
directions: Bring water to a boil in a saucepan
Remove from the heat, and stir in couscous
Cover and let stand for 10 minutes, then fluff with a fork
Mix olives, red bell pepper, sun-dried tomatoes, and couscous together in a bowl
Stir about 1 tablespoon liquid  from olives and 1 tablespoon oil from sun-dried tomatoes into the couscous mixture until moistened
Fold in feta cheese; sprinkle with parsley
